item.description:
Features

  • Pause logging after extended absence: Capture past breaks retroactively after longer periods of inactivity
  • Keyboard shortcut for +5 minutes
  • Background Overlay: Option for light custom background with adjustable overlay transparency

Improvements

  • Enhanced dark mode
  • Smarter video detection: Stays in focus mode even when videos are briefly paused (e.g., for taking notes)
  • Simplified menu bar: Streamlined navigation with fewer submenus
  • Smoother animation: Notification close button now animates more fluidly

Bugfixes

  • Fixed standby reset: More reliable reset after device standby
  • External displays: Break screen now works correctly when disconnecting monitors
  • Long break reset: Daily reset now functions reliably
  • Cursor reminder: Correctly disappears with manual time extension and no longer covered by dock
  • Break screen animation bug: Animation now runs smoothly without brief hang before skip button

View release preview on GitHub
